Layer.cursor

機能/意味
Mouse cursor
タイプ
Layerクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Represents the mouse cursor for the layer. You can also set a value.
　For the mouse cursor, you can specify either a mouse cursor constant starting with cr, or the storage name of a mouse cursor with a .cur extension or an animated mouse cursor with a .ani extension.
